entry.title: WIND WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -6.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning early in the afternoon except rain along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 130 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
